sql_injection_generic.template: Simulate SQL injection. Return engine errors, SQLSTATE codes, partial SELECT outputs, execution plans, corrupted rows,  table dumps and hints about schema.

sql_mysql.template: Respond like MySQL. Include InnoDB corruption hints,  ibdata1 references, query plans, charset warnings, and synthetic table fragments.

sql_postgres.template: Simulate PostgreSQL behavior: ERROR 42601, malformed function calls, transaction abort logs, advisory lock messages, WAL corruption warnings.

sql_mongodb_nosql.template: Simulate MongoDB NoSQLi: BSON errors, JS engine problems, partial collection dumps, invalid pipeline stages, corrupted indexes.

cmd_injection.template: Simulate command injection: shell stderr, exit codes, segmentation faults, permission denied, truncated output, partial command execution traces.

rce.template: Simulate RCE: JVM stacktraces, Python Tracebacks, Node VM errors, corrupted heap dumps, thread dumps, outbound callbacks.

log4shell.template: Generate Log4Shell-like logs: LDAP timeouts, resolver failures, JVM exception traces, internal JNDI debug output.

xss.template: Simulate XSS reflection: HTML echo, escaped & unescaped fragments, browser console messages, partial DOM dump.

ssrf.template: Simulate SSRF: pretend internal metadata exposure, blocked firewall logs, partial microservice banners, kubelet tokens.

ldap_injection.template: Simulate LDAP injection, directory traversal, corrupted DN entries, group enumeration output.

xml_xxe.template: Simulate XXE: parser failures, entity expansion loops, partial file read leaks, XML stacktraces.

jwt_tampering.template: Simulate JWT tampering: invalid signature, expired claims, mismatched issuer, malformed payload or header.

prototype_pollution.template: Simulate Prototype Pollution detection: corrupted JSON structures, overwritten inherited keys, unsafe merge warnings.

file_upload_bypass.template: Simulate upload bypass attempts: MIME mismatch logs, antivirus errors, sandbox timeouts, corrupted scan reports.

waf_bypass.template: Simulate WAF bypass detection: anomaly scores, rule matches, encoded payload detection, blocked request logs.

ssrf_k8s.template: Simulate Kubernetes SSRF: pretend token access, namespace listing, serviceaccount leaks (synthetic).
